alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern El Paso and northern Pueblo Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Calhan to near Schriever AFB to near Fountain. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Hanover, Truckton, Yoder, Ellicott, Schriever AFB and Security-Widefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
